data.text: My God and King, I will proclaim that you are very great/glorious;
Every day I will praise you;
Yahweh you are great, and ◄you ought to be praised/people should praise you► very much;
Parents should tell their children the things that you have done;
They should tell them that you are very glorious and majestic [DOU],
People will speak about your powerful and awesome deeds,
People will remember and proclaim that you are very good to us,
Yahweh, you are kind and merciful to us;
Yahweh, you are good to everyone,
Yahweh, all the creatures that you made will thank you,
They will tell others that you rule gloriously as our king
They will do that in order that everyone will know about your powerful deeds
You will never stop being king;
Yahweh, you help all those who are discouraged
All of the creatures that you made expect that you will provide food for them,
You give food to all living creatures generously [IDM],
Everything that Yahweh does, he does justly/fairly,
Yahweh ◄comes near to/is ready to help► all those who call out to him,
To all those who revere him, he gives them what they need.
Yahweh protects all those who love him,
I [SYN] will always praise Yahweh;
